content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 clove garlic, peeled and minced" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Lightly grease a shallow baking dish.
1) Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and stir in zucchini, onion, and garlic. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "olive oil"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium saucepan"@21:38 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium heat"@44:55 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "stir in"@60:67 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "zucchini"@68:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@78:83 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic"@89:95 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-2 "Cook and stir"@97:110 / AC
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "5 minutes"@111:120 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until tender"@124:136 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Remove saucepan from heat and mix in tomatoes, basil, salt, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-2-0 "saucepan"@10:18 / TOOL )
		:source ( tool-2-1 "heat"@24:28 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "mix in"@33:39 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "tomatoes"@40:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "basil"@50:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@57:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pepper"@67:73 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Arrange halibut steaks in a single layer in the prepared baking dish.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "halibut steaks"@11:25 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "a single layer"@29:43 / OTHER )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "the prepared baking dish"@47:71 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Spoon equal amounts of the zucchini mixture over each steak.
6) Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until fish is easily flaked with a fork.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "15 minutes"@8:18 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "the preheated oven"@22:40 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until fish is easily flaked with a fork"@45:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
